choices: Just wake up somewhere in Retroville
1.content: Alright, my first chapter. Let's see, I guess I need to put some options in the bottom...Alright try these and let me know what you think.
1.title: Chapter One

11.content: So you have just woken up, but now where are you?
11.title: Just wake up somewhere in Retroville

111.content: As your eyes adjust, you realize that your in Jimmy Neutrons lab, and that your also miniaturized. Confused, you wonder how you got here and more importantly how you shrunk. As you think about these two questions, you hear something behind you. Terrified, you wonder what it is. You turn and see...
111.title: At Jimmy's lab

choices: Signal him in the hopes he can help you.
Leave him alone and try to get out of the lab.
1111.content: Goddard, Jimmy's faithful robotic dog was in the lab, charging at a wall outlet. What do you wish to do?
1111.title: Goddard

11111.content: Figuring that he may be able to help you, you cry out "Goddard"
11111.title: Signal him in the hopes he can help you.

choices: Does he percieve you as a threat
111111.content: Because of his robotic hearing, Goddard hears your cries for help and awakens. He then proceeds to investigate the source of the sound, you. Maybe signaling him was a bad idea.
111111.title: Does he hear you?

choices: Shot you with one of his weapons
1111111.content: Unfortunately for you, Goddard scanned you and saw you as an intruder. He then growled at you before he...
1111111.title: Does he percieve you as a threat

11111112.content: Goddard growled at you before he went up to you and...
11111112.title: Other means of disposal

111111122.content: Goddard opened his robotic dog mouth and lowered it quick over you. He then just as quickly swallowed you down his robotic dog throat. You landed in Goddard's 'stomach'. Outside of his metal body, Goddard simply burps as he then digests you and goes back to charging on the wall.
111111122.title: Ate you!

1111112.content: Goddard walks up to you and sniffs you, you don't seem to be a threat so he doesn't bother you. You tell him your situation which at this point is just you shrunken in Jimmy's lab. After hearing this, does Goddard help you?
1111112.title: Is he 'friendly'?

11111122.content: Goddard instead of helping you, decides that you'd make a good...
11111122.title: No

111111221.content: Goddard then licks you and eats you. When you land in his robotic dog stomach, Goddard burps and then digests you.
111111221.title: Meaty snack

111111222.content: Goddard simply bored of you turns around and places his 'back half' over you, knocking you over/under him. He then 'poops' on you and walks away with you buried under his nuts and bolts to basically die, and you do.
111111222.title: 'Bolt' holder

111112.content: Surprisingly Goddard doesn't hear you, so you get the foolish idea to go up to Goddard and wake him. You walk up to his giant mouth and attempt to open it in the hopes of waking him up. You succeed, Goddard wakes up briefly, just long enough to open his mouth and have you fall into his massive mouth.
111112.title: Or not.

1111121.content: Goddard thinking your a recently unstuck nut/bolt, swallows you. You are now in Goddard's thankfully deactivated stomach. You realize now that your trapped in him and it's just a matter of time before he finish's charging and wakes up to unknowingly digest you. Sometime later, you feel Goddard wake up and see his stomach reactivate and begin to fill with digestive enzymes. You scream in pain as Goddard burps and digests you alive.
1111121.title: Does he notice you?

1113.content: You turn around and see nothing there. You exhale in relief as you look around the lab. You then see many of jimmys gadgets like a shrink ray, a jetpack and even some of his designs for new inventions. You suddenly get a grin on your face as you get an idea how to use your miniature state to your advantage. You first het for the shrink ray and point it at the jetpack. You shrink it to about your size so it will fit you. You then put the jetpack on and start to blast off to start your (literally) little adventure around retroville. You fly outside the lab and have an amazing view. You then see the home of jimmy neutron and his parents. Other side you see the home of Cindy vortex who is jimmy's rival across the street. You think about flying to one of these houses. You decide to fly to...
1113.title: Nothing

11131.content: You decide to fly straight to the neutron's house just to save a long flying trip. You see the kitchen window open and fly right in. You land on the dining table and see see a big plate of snacks and cup of water next to you. Flying outside at your size sure made you both hungry and parched. What will you do first?
11131.title: jimmys house

111312.content: You decide to cool off in the big drink cup. You fly up and make a splash. It was cold and refreshing with the ice in here. You dive down and gulp some water, unaware of someone coming, no doubt to eat or drink. That person is...
111312.title: Taking a dip.

11131221.content: "Ohhh finally some time to myself." It was jimmy's mom, Judy apparently taking a breather from being a mom. "Those boys sure are thirsty work!" she said as she grabbed her drink of water, unaware of the little intruder who is you. Suddenly you feel the cup shaking and see Judy about to take a sip of your cool and refreshing dip. You then start to panic as the cup comes to her mouth and starts drinking causing you to swim for your life away from her cave like mouth into her stomach. Can you make it?
11131221.title: A moms relaxation.

111312212.content: To couldn't escape! You were splashed eight in Judy's mouth. Thankfully she didn't drink much, so you manage to land on her tongue and hold on until the water passed. You exhaled in relief as you look to your surroundings. Your looking around was cut short as her mouth opened again showing not only light, but a cracker as well! She starts chewing causing her mouth to shake around you. You try to keep your balance but not for long as she starts to swallow the chewed up snack and sends it along with you to her throat. You ride on close to the throat as you noticed her dangling uvula. You had one chance to catch it. As soon as you were close enough you jump and grab ahold of judys uvula. "Phew" you say to yourself as you hang on for dear life. Judy still seemed to be unaware that your hanging on to her dangling flesh as she starts chewing on another cracker. Her mouth starts shaking again causing the uvula your holding on to swing back and forth making it difficult to hang on to. A few seconds of chewing she then gulps down the snack falling into her stomach. You then try to figure out a way out her throat but all of a sudden Judy stats drinking more water unaware that she's about to wash away her intruder into her stomach. You start to hold on tighter to the uvula and brace yourself for the tidal wave. Do you make it?
111312212.title: In mom's mouth!

11132.content: You fly over to the vortex residence and see Cindy at home in her room. You notice her window is open and fly right in. She seems to be unaware of you. You see her doin homework from school while snacking on some popcorn and purple flurp. You decide to mess with her as you fly around her room like an annoying pest. You start to fly around her head as she starts to notice you which cause her to flinch and shriek a little. "Ew, a bug!" she shouts. She then gets a fly swatter and tries to smack you down. She raises her swatter ready to swat you does she hit or miss?
11132.title: cindys house

111321.content: Cindy manages to hit you, causing your jetpack to go berserk as you start to fly out of control. It sputters and then stops causing you to fall...?
111321.title: yes, MAYDAY!

1113211.content: You fall into cindys popcorn. You feel dizzy after that hit and fall and realize your in cindys popcorn! You then hear Cindy say, "looks like I got him!" Looks like she was unaware that your in her popcorn. You had to act fast and try to escape her snack. Suddenly she's got her hand in her popcorn with you in the pile. She brings it to her mouth and opens it tossing the popcorn and you in her mouth. You had to get out of that popcorn and out of harms way as cindys teeth start coming down. You jump to safety onto her tongue as you watch her crunching that corn. She then starts to swallow the corn along with you. You start falling towards her throat where her uvula. You had one chance and jumped toward her uvula and managed to grab ahold of ot. Outside Cindy starts coughing causing a shake in her mouth with her uvula swinging back and forth making it difficult to hold on to. She then grabs her drink and stats chugging it Dow. Inside you were met with a tidal wave of purple trying to pluck you off her uvula. Do you manage to hang on?
1113211.title: Snack attack!

info.brief_description: This is my first story. It will involve characters from Jimmy Neutron which I don't own.
info.description:
I guess this is where I put the recommendations for the story, alright.
It is a shrinking story and certain elements will be allowed. However Gore or Scat wont be tolerated.
Otherwise have fun and hopefully enjoy my first attempt at a story. I also do not claim ownership of the characters in this story.
Now without further ado, lets do it.
